result.execSummary:
The defendant Ian Robert Ebbole was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Ian Robert Ebbole is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Ian Robert Ebbole was found guilty of Criminal Damage to Property, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Court costs of $473 payable at the rate of $50/mo beginning 11-1-22.  In default of payment, State Debt Collections.  DNA sample ordered.
85 days jail with Good Time.  58 days credit.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: 9:59 a.m.  Defendant Ian Robert Ebbole in court, in custody.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Ian Robert Ebbole.  Prosecuting attorney John Luetscher in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint reviewed.  Written offer given to court by Atty Hansen.  Current address and phone number given to court verbally.  Plea and waiver questionnaire reviewed.  NC plea entered to count 1.  Plea made freely and voluntarily.  Court finds deft. guilty and orders JOC entered into the record.  Count 2 dismissed.  State make recommendation.  Atty Hansen makes recommendation.  Deft. made statement. Court orders court costs of $473 payable at the rate of $50/mo beginning 11-1-22.  In default of payment, State Debt Collections.  85 days jail report forthwith with Good Time.  58 days credit.  DNA sample ordered.

9:31 AM Defendant Ian Robert Ebbole in court, in custody.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Ian Robert Ebbole.  Prosecuting attorney Lawrence James Lasee in court for the State of Wisconsin. Schedule P&S.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 10:00 am.

9:07 AM Prosecuting attorney Lawrence James Lasee in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ian Robert Ebbole in court, in custody.  Attorney Jon G Spansail in court for Ian Robert Ebbole.   Deft. wishes atty Spansail to withdraw.  Court allows atty Spansail to withdraw.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 09:00 am.
No contact with RTA or residence.

1:28 PM Prosecuting attorney Lawrence James Lasee in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ian Robert Ebbole appeared by video, in custody. Def given complaint, advised of charges, and advised of right to counsel/SPD.  Bond is set.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 11, 2022 at 09:00 am.

1:22 PM Defendant Ian Robert Ebbole appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Edward Daniel Burke Jr. in court for State of Wisconsin.   Atty. Spansail present for SPD.  Def given complaint, advised of charges, and advised of right to counsel/SPD.  Bond is set.
